content:
# It appears that the stone furnace does not have any active recipes available for crafting, and the iron plate recipe requires iron ore as an ingredient.
# 
# Since I have already placed iron ore into the stone furnace, it should continue producing iron plates as long as there are sufficient resources and fuel.
# 
# Given that I currently have 13 iron plates in the furnace, I should focus on crafting new entities that will help me expand my production capabilities. 
# 
# I will check if I have enough iron plates in my inventory to craft a Burner Mining Drill, which will allow me to gather resources more efficiently.

ensure_craftable(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, quantity=1)  # Ensuring that I have the materials to craft a Burner Mining Drill.
